text: Manik Chandra Saha (c. 1958 – died 15 January 2004) was a Bangladeshi journalist. He was awarded Ekushey Padak in 2009 by the Government of Bangladesh. == Career == Saha was the Khulna correspondent of the Daily New Age and a stringer of BBC Bangla. == Death == Saha died in a bomb explosion in front of Khulna Press Club in Khulna. == Awards == * Ekushey Padak (2009) == References == Category:2004 deaths Category:Bangladeshi journalists Category:Recipients of the Ekushey Padak Category:Journalists killed in Bangladesh Category:Assassinated Bangladeshi journalists
title: Manik Chandra Saha
